title: The Bomb Collectors
description:
The head of the FBI's Terrorist Explosive Device Analytical Center (TEDAC) reveals the FBI's bomb collection and how specialists gather and study bombs and fragments in order to capture the bomb makers - even in war zones.

Follow Frank on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/FrankFigliuzzi1

Promo code:
HelixSleep.com/Bureau
